thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Does what it says on the tin!
thread.title_full: Does what it says on the tin! - Review of Holiday Inn Express London - Hammersmith, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: srw59
title: Does what it says on the tin!
text:
Booked the Holiday Inn as we were seeing Elbow play at the Apollo. Very happy with our stay. Hotel is clean, functional and our room (325) relatively quiet. Everything we could need, including wifi was available in the room.
Special mention to Reception staff, especially Camel, who was fantastic; he helped us choose a pub for an evening meal - his recommendation was faultless. We had an excellent meal at The Dove and a lovely walk along the riverside.
